## GNSS locations for one male Ruff.

See [`ruff07b5`](../reference/ruff07b5.html) for more information on the dataset. 



```{r}
#| label: map-ruff
#| message: false
#| output-div: ruff

data(ruff07b5)

ruff <- as_ctdf(ruff07b5, time = "timestamp") |>
  cluster_track()

map(ruff)

```
